trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> objects.
A BuildPropertyGroup object can represent a element in the project, or a virtual collection of properties, such as global properties or environment variable properties.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> class.
Initializes a new PropertyGroup element in the specified project.
See [PropertyGroup Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information on property groups.
The name of the Project in which to add the new PropertyGroup.

Adds a new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
The new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.

Adds a new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to treat the `propertyValue` parameter as a literal value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.

Removes the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup.Condition*> property value and all <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> objects from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
Creates a deep or shallow copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
A shallow copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> references the same property group as the original.
Modifications a shallow copy will be reflected in both copies.

A deep copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> creates a new XML element to reference so that both copies of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> can be independently modified.

If the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> corresponds directly to a element in the project (rather than corresponding to a collection of virtual properties, such as environment variable and global properties), only deep copies are allowed.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to create a deep copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
Gets or sets the `Condition` attribute value of the property group.
The `Condition` attribute value of the property group.
Gets a value indicating the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.

A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> object can represent a element in the project, or a virtual collection of properties, such as global properties or environment variable properties.
An integer value representing the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> objects in the collection.
Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.

This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property group was imported into the project.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property group was imported into the project; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> object in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> to get or set.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> object in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
Removes the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> to remove.

Removes the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> to remove.
Sets the condition for imported property groups.
Changes are not persisted.
The condition to add to the imported PropertyGroup.

Sets the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> property value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> to set.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> property value to assign the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.

Sets the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> property value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> to set.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> property value to assign the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to treat the `propertyValue` parameter as a literal value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
